[@cel](@f/6sQ6d2CMxRUhLpspgGIulDxDCwYD7DzFzPNr7u5AU=.ed25519)

P.S. I wanted to make sure I told you about how much I appreciated the way you brought up the problem, described the context, and made suggestions (multiple!) for how we might go about resolving the regression. It would've been super easy to just make a post saying "I'm bummed that ssb-markdown broke newlines" but I thought it was really cool how you went *way* past that so that we could all properly sync up and focus on resolving this. ‚ù§
